meanings.definition: A device that automatically regulates temperature
meanings.sent1: The thermostats in our house keep the rooms at just the right temperature.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to set the thermostats to a comfortable level before going to bed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play with the thermostats, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor acted like thermostats, always adjusting to keep the situation under control.
meanings.sent5: The thermostats hummed softly as they worked tirelessly to maintain the room's warmth.

meanings.definition: The control unit of a heating or cooling system
meanings.sent1: Dad adjusted the thermostats to make the house warmer during the cold winter night.
meanings.sent2: The technician checked the thermostats to ensure they were functioning properly.
meanings.sent3: The thermostats seemed to have a mind of their own, changing the temperature unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her voice acted like thermostats, controlling the mood of the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The old thermostats clicked loudly when adjusting the temperature, sounding like a tiny orchestra.
